# center

**Instance Property**

The point in the containing view at which to place the center of the view being animated.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var center: CGPoint { get }
```

## Getting the target attributes

- **container**: The container for the view being animated.
- **transform**: An affine transform to apply to the view being animated.
